attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scrap the £25 V5 charge.
I find I have to pay £25 because I have just bought a second hand car that had a personal numberplate by its last owner.
I am informed by the DVLA that the only way not to pay this is, is to produce the bottom of of a V5 document in its new registration, this has not been issued, utill £25 is paid for its issue.
This is just a hidden tax.
